thread.title: Ximah Digital: Ecuador, source of inspiration

author: cbs8
title: Ximah Digital: Ecuador, source of inspiration
text:
Ximah Digital
New campaign of the Ministry of Tourism calls upon people to feel
GUAYAQUIL , Ecuador , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Ecuador invites you to " Feel Again. " The latest stage of the successful tourism campaign, All You Need is Ecuador , is brimming with feelings that international artists will be sharing on their social networks and on the digital platform www.feelagainproject.com
Four teams made up of 18 multi-disciplinary contemporary artists from the United Kingdom , the United States , Germany and Canada , will be traveling to Ecuador between September 21st and 29th . The groups will visit the most picturesque spots in the regions of the Coast, the Andes, Amazonia and the Gal√°pagos.
The Feel Again project is relying on a digital strategy that everyone can follow at the accounts of Ecuador Travel on Facebook ( https://www.facebook.com/EcuadorTravel ), Twitter ( https://twitter.com/EcuadorTravel ) and Instagram ( https://instagram.com/ecuadortravel/ ), and through hashtag #FeelAgainInEcuador. Coverage will be provided in real time, with each artist sharing his journey via spoken accounts, photos, videos and other multimedia forms of expression.
Taking into account the infinite sensations that people encounter while traveling through a highly diverse Ecuador , the artists will be working to capture their experiences of food, culture, adventure and nature in a multimedia product to be distributed internationally in coming months.
In 2014, the campaign All You Need is Ecuador showed the world that the country is a unique and astonishing destination. This latest phase is backed up by an investment of 9.8 million dollars , and aims to let people know that in Ecuador you can get back in touch with your feelings and with yourself.
Which artists will be participating?
Andrew Norton , USA
Brendan Van Son , USA
Marc Reisbig , USA
Scott Pommier , USA
Boniot Paille, CANADA
Jeff Bartlett , CANADA
Jesse Louttit , CANADA
Rick Leong , CANADA
Johannes Conrad , GERMANY
Michelle Phillips , GERMANY
Rocket & Wink, GERMANY
Steve Hanisch , GERMANY
Conor MacNeill , UK
Esther Teichmann , UK
Jason and Keiko Hindley , UK
Sara Thomas , UK
Contact Information: info@ximah.com - +59346043235
